Los Angeles Times won't endorse for president  —  The Scoop  —  The owner of the Los Angeles Times has blocked the paper from endorsing a candidate for president this year.  —  Last week, the LA Times published its electoral endorsements for the 2024 election.

Trump set to go on Joe Rogan's podcast  —  Former President Donald Trump is expected to record an interview with podcasting behemoth Joe Rogan on Friday.  The interview will take place at Rogan's studio in Austin, Texas, according to a person familiar with the plans who was granted anonymity to discuss the matter.

McDonald's Quarter Pounder burgers linked to E. coli outbreak  —  McDonald's Quarter Pounder burgers and some ingredients will be temporarily unavailable in some states to protect customers after the food was linked to an E. coli outbreak, according to a press release from the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) on Tuesday.

Do bike lanes really cause more traffic congestion?  Here's what the research says  —  Studies from around the world show bike lanes ease congestion, reduce emissions and are a boon to businesses  —  The subject of bike lanes can be a contentious one, particularly in a busy city like Toronto.

Army ordered to release records on Trump's Arlington cemetery visit  —  A federal judge has ordered Army officials to release their records by the end of this week regarding President Donald Trump's controversial visit to Arlington National Cemetery this summer.

Unknown substance posted with political signs in Ahwatukee; roads closed  —  PHOENIX (AZFamily) — Authorities closed roads in a community south of Phoenix after bags of a substance were found at multiple locations Tuesday morning.  —  Around 3 a.m., Phoenix Fire and Police responded near a health care facility for an emergency.
